Package lib.async

Class AsyncProjectAnalyzer

java.lang.Object
lib.async.AsyncProjectAnalyzer
All Implemented Interfaces:
ProjectAnalyzer
public class AsyncProjectAnalyzer extends Object implements ProjectAnalyzer
Asynchronous project analyzer to get lib.reports about java sources.
See Also:
